content:
# I have successfully crafted a Stone Furnace, and my inventory now contains one Stone Furnace, along with the remaining resources of coal and stone. 
# Now, I will place the Stone Furnace at my current position to start processing resources.

# Step 7: Place the Stone Furnace at the stone resource patch
furnace_position = place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=stone_position)  # Place the furnace at the stone patch
print(f"Placed Stone Furnace at {furnace_position}")
